title: Mural "Man - Being Human?"
img_alt: Mural Man - Being Human? by Seiji Kimoto, Saarland conservatory
intro_text: Entitled "Man - Being Human?", the only large panel painting in acrylic by Seiji Kimoto is to be found in Saarland conservatory, Saarbrücken. In both theme and design this mural is a continuation of the "Bonsai People", Kimoto's graphical analysis of the manipulated society published in 1983. The painting is owned by the state government of the Saarland, which had acquired it in 1990 under the auspices of former member of the Ministry of Culture, Josef Gros, for the college of music.
